Text:
Although I've previously been quite skeptical to awaken888 and his former identities because of the mishmash and "bundling" of quite confusing qualities and content + descriptions, I have to say he's now actually collecting uploads in categories were the POtHS-prefix is a nice way of finding a LOT of material not otherwise available in such an extent. 

I salute you, old Iron-bender. Thank you.

V.
